name: Zhaojun Cong
summary:
I specialize in data engineering and financial analytics with a focus on building reliable, compliant, and scalable data systems. Over the years, I’ve supported diverse stakeholders—including Finance, FP&A, and Accounting teams—by designing ETL/ELT pipelines, automating reporting workflows, and ensuring compliance with regulatory standards such as SOX, MSB, and tax reporting.
My experience includes building integrated data layers (IDL), migrating reporting processes from MSTR to Tellius, and developing dashboards for leadership reporting and pipeline monitoring. I enjoy working at the intersection of finance and technology, helping teams manage budgets, optimize costs, and gain insights through data-driven decision-making.
I also have hands-on experience in behavior analysis, data quality control, and curated dataset design, ensuring accuracy and reliability in financial reporting. More recently, I’ve been exploring machine learning and large language models—experimenting with Text-to-SQL, RAG, and LangChain—to unlock new ways of interacting with financial data.
At my core, I’m passionate about using data to bridge business needs and technical solutions, while continuously improving systems for scalability, compliance, and innovation.
programming_skills: Python, SQL, Spark/Hive, Java, Tableau, Microstrategy, Sensor, Tellius, Excel
technologies: Linux, Docker, Hadoop, TensorFlow, Sklearn, Pandas, Langchain, Streamlit, FastApi
certifications:
Chinese Private Equity Fund Practitioner Certification (2018), Google Analytics Certificate, Coursera
ETL, Finance & Accounting Certificate

hts.

experiences.title: Financial Analyst
